comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Retro Beach, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 23682063@N08
comment._content: I can't work out the lighting. There may be a reflector, or perhaps it's just the sand. At any rate, the effect is to make her stand out and is very pleasing.
